com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp

Class MleActorGC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp.MleChunkReader
      • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.dpp.MleActorGC

  • public class MleActorGC
extends MleChunkReader
    This class is used to manage the group context (GC) of a collection of Actors.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Constructor Detail

      • MleActorGC

        public MleActorGC(byte[] stream)
        A constructor that initializes the byte stream to process.
        Parameters:
        stream - An array of bytes consisting of Digital Playprint operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getSets

        public MleSet[] getSets()
        Get the collection of Sets that are associated with the Actor Group Context.
        Returns:
        The collection is returned as an array of MleSet.

      • getActorRegistry

        public MleActorGC.MleActorRegistry[] getActorRegistry()
        Get the Actor registry.
        Returns:
        The Actor registry is returned as an array of MleActorRegistry entries.

      • chunkInitialization

        public void chunkInitialization(int size)
        Initialize the state for processing the Actor Group context.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the bookkeeping tables.

      • readIndex

        public long readIndex()
               throws MleDppException
        Read an index from the byte stream.
        Returns:
        An index is returned as a long.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the index can not be read from the byte stream. This exception will also be thrown if the index is invalid (less than 0).

      • parseStream

        public void parseStream(int chunkType)
                 throws MleDppException,
                        MleRuntimeException
        Parse the byte stream.
        Parameters:
        chunkType - The type of chunk that is being parsed from the byte stream.
        Throws:
        MleDppException - This exception is thrown if the byte stream can not be parsed and processed successfully.
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the Set can not be successfully initialized.
